translated: The eight uṣṇīṣas are the eight charnel grounds.🔽“The head is the skull cup, and the spine is the skeleton” means that the ten maṇḍalas that exist in one’s body, the eight directional guardians, the eight trees, the eight charnel grounds, and the garland of skulls of the head are the great cakra of great bliss.

original: thod phreng bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo/_/keng rus sgal tshhig 'di pa'i rgu ces pas
analyzed: thod phreng bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo/_/keng rus sgal tshhig 'di pa'i rgu ces pas
translated: “The spine is the skeleton” is explained.

original: bstan to/_/de nas bde bas bdag nyid stong nyid don rtogs pas ces pa ni/
analyzed: bstan to/_/de nas bde bas bdag nyid stong nyid don rtogs pas ces pa ni/
translated: “Since one realizes the meaning of emptiness through bliss,”

original: bde mchog 'khor lo'i ti ka
analyzed: bde mchog 'khor lo'i ti ka
translated: the meaning of the Great Bliss of the Cakrasaṃvara Tika is explained.

original: bde thob grub pa mnyes/_stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs ces pas bstan to/_/de
analyzed: bde thob grub pa mnyes/_stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs ces pas bstan to/_/de
translated: “One obtains bliss and is pleased. One realizes the meaning of emptiness.”

original: rtogs nas bya ba ci zhig bya zhe na/_rang byung mchod rten rnams skor ba bya/_ces
analyzed: rtogs nas bya ba ci zhig bya zhe na/_rang byung mchod rten rnams skor ba bya/_ces
translated: The text says, “One should circumambulate the self-originated stupas.”

original: pas bstan to/_/rang byung rang gi lus la gnas pa'i 'khor lo bzhi lid pa'o/_/
analyzed: pas bstan to/_/rang byung rang gi lus la gnas pa'i 'khor lo bzhi lid pa'o/_/
translated: The self-originated ones are the four cakras that exist in one’s body.

original: mchod rten rnams ni/_de rnams kyi dbus na gnas pa'i yi ge rnams so/_/bskor
analyzed: mchod rten rnams ni/_de rnams kyi dbus na gnas pa'i yi ge rnams so/_/bskor
translated: The stupas are the syllables that exist in the center of those cakras.

original: ba bya ces pa ni/_dmigs pa byas nas/_bskor ba bya ces pa ni bstan to/_/de
analyzed: ba bya ces pa ni/_dmigs pa byas nas/_bskor ba bya ces pa ni bstan to/_/de
translated: “ One should circumambulate” means that having visualized that, one should circumambulate.🔽“ One who does that” is the one who does that.

original: ltar mdzad mkhan de rang gang yin zhe na/_zhi lha b+hu su ku ni smra bar byed/_b+hu su ku
analyzed: ltar mdzad mkhan de rang gang yin zhe na/_zhi lha b+hu su ku ni smra bar byed/_b+hu su ku
translated: “ The one who speaks is Śiva Bhūsuku.”

original: de b+hu bzang po/_su gnyid log pa/_ku phyi sar 'chags pa yin te/_gzhan yang
analyzed: de b+hu bzang po/_su gnyid log pa/_ku phyi sar 'chags pa yin te/_gzhan yang
translated: Bhū is good, and suku is sleep.

original: las gang yang mi byed pas na/_'du byed gsum pa zhes bstan to/_/
analyzed: las gang yang mi byed pas na/_'du byed gsum pa zhes bstan to/_/
translated: Since one does not perform any other action, it is explained as the third🔽composition.🔽Having explained the two syllables of the text, the third

original: des gzhung gi 'bru gnyer bstan nas/_gsum pa gsang ba ltar spyod pa
analyzed: des gzhung gi 'bru gnyer bstan nas/_gsum pa gsang ba ltar spyod pa
translated: is the explanation of the conduct according to the secret.🔽The accumulation of the accumulations of merit and

original: ni/_skyed pa'i rim pa'i sgo nas/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshhogs bsags
analyzed: ni/_skyed pa'i rim pa'i sgo nas/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshhogs bsags
translated: wisdom is done through the stage of generation.

original: nas/_bdag gi mdun du chos dbyings de steng yam ram bam sum las ri rab/_pam
analyzed: nas/_bdag gi mdun du chos dbyings de steng yam ram bam sum las ri rab/_pam
translated: In front of me, from yām, raṃ, vaṃ, suṃ, and laṃ, are Mount Meru,

original: las pad+ma/_de steng nyi zla kha sbyor/_de dbus bam dang /_hum rnams zhu bas
analyzed: las pad+ma/_de steng nyi zla kha sbyor/_de dbus bam dang /_hum rnams zhu bas
translated: a lotus from paṃ, and a sun-moon union on top of that. In the center of that, from vaṃ and hūṃ,🔽in the center of the space of phenomena, is the space of phenomena.

original: chos dbyings kyi dbus su/_chos dbyings bsam/_de nas dpal he ru ka_/
analyzed: chos dbyings kyi dbus su/_chos dbyings bsam/_de nas dpal he ru ka_/
translated: Then, glorious Heruka

original: yum rdo rje phag mos mkhyud pa/_zhal gcig e las phyag gnyis kyi glang po'i pags pa
analyzed: yum rdo rje phag mos mkhyud pa/_zhal gcig e las phyag gnyis kyi glang po'i pags pa
translated: is embraced by Vajravārāhī. Imagine that she has one face and two hands, holding an elephant skin from e.

original: 'dzin par bsam/_de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' bstan nas/_bdag🔽nyid kyi lte ba nas 'od 'phros nas/_ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bkug_/yid
analyzed: 'dzin par bsam/_de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' bstan nas/_bdag nyid kyi lte ba nas 'od 'phros nas/_ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bkug_/yid
translated: Having explained the concentration being,🔽light shines from my navel and summons the gnosis being in front.🔽Make mental offerings.

original: kyi mchod pa bya/_mdun na mo la thim/_de 'od kyi tshhul du bdag la bsdu/_bdag
analyzed: kyi mchod pa bya/_mdun na mo la thim/_de 'od kyi tshhul du bdag la bsdu/_bdag
translated: The front one dissolves into me.🔽I dissolve into light

original: nyid de'i 'od kyi zhu ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi dbus su/_bdag nyid thig ler
analyzed: nyid de'i 'od kyi zhu ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi dbus su/_bdag nyid thig ler
translated: and imagine myself as a bindu in the center of the space of phenomena.

original: bsam/_'gro ba'i don du ri rab kyi steng du/_sna tshhogs pad+ma'i ge sar la/_khyab
analyzed: bsam/_'gro ba'i don du ri rab kyi steng du/_sna tshhogs pad+ma'i ge sar la/_khyab
translated: For the benefit of migrating beings, on top of Mount Meru, in the center of a multicolored lotus,🔽pervading

original: 'jug dbang phyug dbu ma'i gdan la/_rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa/_pad 'dab🔽bzhi la sgom bzhis bskor ba/_de'i phyi rol du/_'khor lo gsum gyi dpa' bo
analyzed: 'jug dbang phyug dbu ma'i gdan la/_rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa/_pad 'dab bzhi la sgom bzhis bskor ba/_de'i phyi rol du/_'khor lo gsum gyi dpa' bo
translated: On the central seat of the lord of the initiation, Vajravārāhī embraces him, and on the four lotus petals are the four yoginīs.

original: dpa' mo dang /_dam tshhig gi lha mo dang /_dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba'i nga
analyzed: dpa' mo dang /_dam tshhig gi lha mo dang /_dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba'i nga
translated: Outside of that are the heroes and heroines of the three wheels, the pledge goddesses, and the eight charnel grounds.

original: rgyal byas nas/_rang gi nyams dgu'i nyams kyi spyod pa bya/_/ces pas bstan
analyzed: rgyal byas nas/_rang gi nyams dgu'i nyams kyi spyod pa bya/_/ces pas bstan
translated: Having made that the identity, one should perform the conduct of the nine enjoyments of one’s own experience.

original: to/_/des gsum pa gsang ltar spyod pa'i sgo nas gzhung legs par bstan to/
analyzed: to/_/des gsum pa gsang ltar spyod pa'i sgo nas gzhung legs par bstan to/
translated: That explains the third chapter, the excellent explanation of the text through the conduct of the secret practice.

original: slob dpon b+hu su kus mdzad pa'i bde mchog 'khor lo'i ta ki rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: slob dpon b+hu su kus mdzad pa'i bde mchog 'khor lo'i ta ki rdzogs so//_//
translated: The Cakrasaṃvara Taki by Master Bhūṣaṇa is complete.
